phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.analysis:
Phoenix has a heavily entrenched taxi market in which there is regulation mandating minimum wait times and ...

The environment is so hostile that TNCs have not been able to enter this market at all. Uber, Lyft, and Sidecar all do not operation in Phoenix.
